RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 56. Maiden Claiming Purse 7700. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HOPPERNESS pressed early then raced evenly on the turn rallying to a short lead in the three path mid stretch digging in late. TRUST FUND ROBBER trailed on the turn rallying four wide down the lane pressing the winner late. CAPTAIN BERNARDO chased the pace losing ground while weakening into upper stretch besting the others with an even finish in the six path. WILDCAT HAGRID pressed the pace dueling into upper stretch weakening late. BEST AND FINAL raced a step slow moving seven wide down the lane. COMMANDER CODY raced evenly tiring in upper stretch. SECOND LIEUTENANT set a pressured pace wearing down in upper stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Commander Cody
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, tired lane

ENTRY.NAME: Second Lieutenant
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace, wore down

ENTRY.NAME: Best and Final
ENTRY.COMMENT: step slow, 7 wide lane

ENTRY.NAME: Trust Fund Robber
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed turn, rallied 4 wide lane, pressed winner late

ENTRY.NAME: Hopperness
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed early, evenly turn, rallied to lead lane, dug in

ENTRY.NAME: Captain Bernardo
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, lost ground to lane, finished evenly 6 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Wildcat Hagrid
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, dueled to lane, weakened lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 87. Claiming Purse 8500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON THREE RACES SINCE NOVEMBER 14, 2022. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 14 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ANOTHER BREEZE slow early surged wide into upper stretch wresting the lead angling in once clear. KICKSTARTER pressed early then chased on the inside to upper stretch going all out late to save place. JOCKO ROAD chased the pace racing between horses to upper stretch hanging late. BEYOND GONE slow early lost ground to upper stretch racing seven wide there. FEDERALE pressed early racing inside to upper stretch weakening there. SUTTON VALLEY pressed clear on the turn then faded down the stretch. SKYSCANNER trailed throughout. A CLAIM OF FOUL FROM THE RIDER OF JOCKO ROAD AGAINST THE RIDER OF ANOTHER BREEZE FOR INTERFERENCE ENTERING THE LANE WAS DISMISSED BY THE STEWARDS.

ENTRY.NAME: Skyscanner
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Federale
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed early, inside lane, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Another Breeze
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, wide move turn, led upper stretch, angled in

ENTRY.NAME: Jocko Road
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, between to lane, hung

ENTRY.NAME: Beyond Gone
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, lost ground to lane, finished evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Kickstarter
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed early, chased inside to lane, all out for place

ENTRY.NAME: Sutton Valley
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, faded lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 3 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 67. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16500. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 118 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MO TOWN BLUES pressured on pace dueling in upper stretch edging clear at mid track. MOON OVER DUBAI pressed the pace holding a narrow lead in upper stretch ceding grudgingly to outside pressure. SPY TOWN a step slow through the turb lost ground to upper stretch gaining late seven wide. MR HARRY chased the pace cutting the corner to bid from the rail in upper stretch weakening late. COSMIC CONNECTION faded on the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Moon Over Dubai
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, dueled into lane, ceded grudgingly

ENTRY.NAME: Mr Harry
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, rode rail to lane, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Mo Town Blues
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, dueled lane, edged clear mid track

ENTRY.NAME: Cosmic Connection
ENTRY.COMMENT: faded on the turn

ENTRY.NAME: Spy Town
ENTRY.COMMENT: step slow, 7 wide lane, gained late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 4 2F Dirt CR: 88. Claiming Purse 11000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (Winners At Two Furlongs in 2022-2023 To Carry 2 lbs. Additional For Each Race Won).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: REJUVENATE got up gamely inside of rival. CAJUN MANDATE abreast foe just missed. INSPIRING JUSTICE close up three deep hung late. SOMERSET BAY was in close at the break. COFFEE WITH ALEX played no factor. SKYLAS GOLD was in close at the break. VASY SAYS NYET was always outrun. BORN FOR VICTORY was off a beat slow.

ENTRY.NAME: Rejuvenate
ENTRY.COMMENT: up gamely inside of foe

ENTRY.NAME: Skylas Gold
ENTRY.COMMENT: in close at the break

ENTRY.NAME: Somerset Bay
ENTRY.COMMENT: in close at the break

ENTRY.NAME: Vasy Says Nyet
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Coffee With Alex
ENTRY.OWNER: Stevark Stable Inc and Rentz Randy
ENTRY.COMMENT: played no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Cajun Mandate
ENTRY.COMMENT: abreast foe just missed,

ENTRY.NAME: Inspiring Justice
ENTRY.COMMENT: three deep, hung late

ENTRY.NAME: Born for Victory
ENTRY.COMMENT: off a beat slow

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 71. Allowance Purse 18800. FOR ACCREDITED WEST VIRGINIA-BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 14 Allowed 3 lbs. (Maiden Or Claiming Races For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In E stimating Allowances) (Preference To Highest Earnings In 2022 - 2023).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: XCELLENT START surged on the turn bidding three deep down the lane getting up late. KARMA BUS pressed to lead on the turn dueling down the lane moving between horses late just missing. ROAD MINISTER pressed bid on the turn dueling from the rail down the stretch being right there at the end. WHY WINCHILL WHY well back early passed a few down the lane. WATCHING SNOW FLY gave hard pursuit through the turn tiring in upper stretch. FAST RIDE showed early speed being passed on the turn giving way in upper stretch. ZERO FOR CONDUCT folded up on the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Fast Ride
ENTRY.COMMENT: early speed, passed on turn, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Road Minister
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed on the turn, extended inside down the lane, right there

ENTRY.NAME: Xcellent Start
ENTRY.OWNER: Coleswood Farm, Inc. and Raim, David
ENTRY.COMMENT: surged up on turn, bid three deep lane, got up late

ENTRY.NAME: Watching Snow Fly
ENTRY.COMMENT: pursued through the turn, tired,

ENTRY.NAME: Zero for Conduct
ENTRY.COMMENT: folded up on turn

ENTRY.NAME: Why Winchill Why
ENTRY.COMMENT: well back early, passed a few

ENTRY.NAME: Karma Bus
ENTRY.OWNER: Brown Nicole and Brown Ronney W
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed to lead turn, dueled between lane, just missed,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 85. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 18800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $12,500. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since Octob er 14 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Claiming Races For $10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CONTENT a step slow through the turn emerged in upper stretch surging clear late in the four path. LOVELY LOLA raced very wide into upper stretch closing willingly late. SWEET QUEEN BEE pressed the pace wresting the lead on the turn digging in from the two path down the lane ceding late to outside pressure. IN TO THE NIGHT bumped at the break was well back early racing wide into upper stretch moving up late. ACCOLADES GALORE saved ground bidding near the rail in upper stretch weakening late. SUM KINDA PRETTY chased through the turn fading near mid track in upper stretch. TUNSTALL pressed the pace through the turn wearing out in upper stretch. WHISKEY TALKING was never involved. MUSICAL RIDE gave way on the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Content
ENTRY.COMMENT: step slow, emerged top lane, surged clear four path

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Charlie Rimer, Jessica Rimer & Lisa Nowicki

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Queen Bee
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, led turn, dug in two path, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Musical Ride
ENTRY.COMMENT: gave way on the turn

ENTRY.NAME: Sum Kinda Pretty
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, faded mid track

ENTRY.NAME: Accolades Galore
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, pressed upper stretch, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Whiskey Talking
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

ENTRY.NAME: In to the Night
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped break, well back, wide into lane, moved up

ENTRY.NAME: Tunstall
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, spent lane

ENTRY.NAME: Lovely Lola
ENTRY.COMMENT: very wide into lane, closed willingly outside

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 80. Starter Allowance Purse 14200. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $4,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since October 14 Allowed 3 lbs. (Claiming Races For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances) (Preference To Highest Earnings In 2022 - 2023).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CARLIE Q BLUE set the pace coming under pressure on the far turn extending inside of rival down the lane holding on gamely. PETTIGO GIRL stalked the pace pressing in bid on the far turn bearing down outside of foe through the lane going between horses late giving all. CAR LADY off slowly lagged early losing ground to upper stretch hitting stride late giving a strong finish six wide. HUMMIN' THE FUNK slow early raced wide to upper stretch outbidding the others late. STARSHIP NUGGET raced evenly in second flight. GALILEO'S AFFAIR slow early played no factor. LILAC LACE tracked evenly through the far turn wearing out in upper stretch. ALITTLESLICEOF PIE stalked the early pace then gave way on the far turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Car Lady
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slowly, lagged early, swung out to lane, strong finish 6 wide

ENTRY.NAME: Lilac Lace
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked evenly, spent lane

ENTRY.NAME: Alittlesliceof Pie
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, gave way on the far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Carlie Q Blue
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, hooked far turn, extended lane, held gamely,

ENTRY.NAME: Starship Nugget
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Pettigo Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, pressed bid far turn, bore down lane, out gamed

ENTRY.NAME: Hummin' the Funk
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, wide into lane, outbid others

ENTRY.NAME: Galileo's Affair
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, no factor,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 8 5F Dirt CR: 76. Claiming Purse 7900. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 14 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MENTIROSA off slowly advanced outside on the turn bidding wide down the lane getting up in time. ROCKIN MACHEN set the pace dueling inside on the turn clearing in upper stretch being run down late. ELUSIVE MOTION chased early pressing three deep on the turn weakening in upper stretch. THE FIVE B'S pressed the pace dueling between horses on the turn wearing out in upper stretch. I'LL FINISH faded on the turn. PITCH DARK was never involved.

ENTRY.NAME: Rockin Machen
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, hooked on turn, cleared top alne, run down

ENTRY.NAME: I'll Finish
ENTRY.COMMENT: faded on the turn

ENTRY.NAME: Pitch Dark
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

ENTRY.NAME: The Five B's
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, dueled between on turn, spent lane

ENTRY.NAME: Elusive Motion
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased early, pressed three deep turn, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Mentirosa
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slowly, advanced outside turn, wide bid lane, up in time
